description: This is the main entry point for a React application's frontend. It initializes the ReactDOM root, wraps the main <App /> component with routing and strict mode, and mounts it to the DOM element with ID 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render a React element tree into the specified DOM container.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A tool for highlighting potential problems in an application during development.
